scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='node_modules/entities/package.json';const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p));const missing={'./escape':{'require':'./lib/escape.js','import':'./lib/esm/escape.js'},'./decode':{'require':'./lib/decode.js','import':'./lib/esm/decode.js'},'./encode':{'require':'./lib/encode.js','import':'./lib/esm/encode.js'}};let patched=false;Object.entries(missing).forEach(([k,v])=>{if(!pkg.exports[k]){pkg.exports[k]=v;patched=true;}});if(patched){fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2));console.log('entities: exports patched');}else{console.log('entities: no patch needed');}"
